labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.adobe.com%2Ffonts) ### Comment Username: @WinkelCode > Faulty rule: `||use.typekit.net^$font,removeparam=~/^(primer|subset_id)=/` > > Issue is fixed by disabling the rule. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/8DOVK3R.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/WvrozaF.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | AdGuard URL Tracking filter Browser: | Confirmed in Firefox and Edge Filters: | Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking Other extensions used: | uBlock Origin

comment.body:
@Alex-302 My best guess is that it's not consistently enforced, could be related to CDN providers, geographical regions, or current traffic volume.

Not sure what else I can do to prove this, I recorded the entire process of firing up a VM, installing Firefox, installing uBlock Origin, only enabling the "AdGuard URL Tracking Filter", then showcasing the issue and the rule to fix it:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29005772/204943175-e49cced8-9b19-46ff-82e9-ada7dfa36578.mp4

It's an annoying issue, for example now it works fine for me again, even with the filter. I also just noticed that I forgot to record the uBlock Origin/Dev Console logs, it might take a couple hours for the issue to appear again, I can make a new recording, this time with the logs.

issue.title: blogtruyen.vn page not working
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4 nighify 36

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.blogtruyen.vn/c748867/vua-otaku-vua-ngheo-vua-nhat-nhung-co-ban-gai-xinh-dep-giau-co-nay-lai-yeu-toi-moi-la-chuong-31

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Location API

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. The problem will be solved if I add filter `@@||img.datrangsang.net/images^$domain=datrangsang.net`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45375496/204985820-0c652dcf-a38c-4fb5-b968-80328f6e472b.png)

</details>

<details>=
</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress

It's caused by `Stealth mode` - `Hide your Referrer from third-parties` (it's a common issue).
Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

comment.body:
>może w Operze problem z jej wewnętrznym blockerem

Inne rozszerzenia/programy blokujące reklamy (również te wbudowane w przeglądarkę) też mogą powodować problemy i z tego co widzę, to tak jest w tym przypadku.
Dodałem kolejną regułę (aktualizacja filtrów powinna być dostępna za około 1-2 godziny) i możliwe, że będzie działało nawet z włączonym "adblockiem" wbudowanym w Operę.
Ogólnie polecam korzystać tylko z jednego rozszerzenia/programu do blokowania reklam, bo korzystania z dwóch (czy więcej) może powodować problemy, tak jak tutaj.
